generalInfo:
This combined Saudi Arabia and UAE tour offers a rich cultural and modern experience. In Saudi Arabia, travel comfortably by bus, van, and 4x4, with an economy-class train ticket between Medina and Jeddah. Stay on a bed and breakfast basis while exploring key cities like Riyadh, Medina, Jeddah, and AlUla with expert English-speaking guides. Enjoy included museum and site entrance fees, 2 lunches, 3 dinners, plus snacks and refreshments.

In Dubai and Abu Dhabi, private transfers and comfortable accommodations are provided. Experience iconic tours including the Dubai Classic Tour, Desert Safari with BBQ Dinner, Dubai Modern Tour with Burj Khalifa visits, Marina Dhow Cruise with dinner, and a full-day Abu Dhabi tour featuring the Louvre Museum. Meals include 4 dinners and 1 seafood lunch in Jeddah. All tours feature English-speaking guides.

Please note that international/domestic flights, personal expenses, optional tours, and travel insurance are not included.

Inclusions
Saudi Arabia
• Transportation: Bus, Van, & 4x4
• Train Ticket: Medina ? Jeddah (Economy Class)
• Accommodation: Bed & Breakfast basis
• Tour Guides:
o English-speaking guides in Riyadh, Medina, and Jeddah
o Local driver (basic English) in AlUla
• Museum & Site Entrance Fees
• Meals:
o 2 Lunches
o 3 Dinners
• Snacks & Refreshments
Dubai & Abu Dhabi
• Private Transfers for all tours & airport pickups/drop-offs
• Accommodation: Bed & Breakfast basis
• Tours & Sightseeing:
o Dubai Classic Tour
o Desert Safari with BBQ Dinner
o Dubai Modern Tour with Burj Khalifa (124th & 125th floor)
o Marina Dhow Cruise with Dinner
o Full-Day Abu Dhabi Tour with Louvre Museum
• Meals:
o 4 Dinners (Desert Safari, Dhow Cruise, 2 Hotel Dinners)
o 1 Lunch (Seafood lunch in Jeddah)
• English-speaking guide during all tours
________________________________________
Exclusions
• International & domestic flights
• Personal expenses & gratuities
• Optional tours & activities
• Travel insurance

dayInfo.description: Arrival in Riyadh • Airport pick-up • Hotel check-in • Overnight stay in Riyadh • Meals: No meals included

Riyadh City Tour • Breakfast at hotel • Visit Ad Diriyah – historic city from 1446 AD • Explore Masmak Fort – symbol of Saudi history • Lunch at Najd Village (included) • Stroll through Souk Al-Zal for antiques & traditional crafts • Dinner at a local restaurant (included) • Return to hotel & overnight stay in Riyadh

Riyadh to AlUla • Breakfast at hotel • Hotel check-out • Flight to AlUla (excluded) • Hotel check-in • Sunset at Elephant Rock – iconic geological marvel • Dinner at the hotel (included) • Overnight stay in AlUla

Exploring AlUla • Breakfast at hotel • Visit Al Hegra (UNESCO site) – explore over 110 tombs • Discover Dadan – Kingdom of Lihyanite & Dadanite • Visit Harrat Viewpoint • Return to hotel • Dinner at the hotel (included) • Overnight stay in AlUla

AlUla to Medina & Jeddah • Breakfast at hotel • Hotel check-out • Drive to Medina (328km) • Visit Medina’s historical & religious landmarks • Travel to Jeddah by Train (1h49min, Economy Class) • Transfer to hotel & check-in • Overnight stay in Jeddah • Meals: No meals included

Jeddah City Tour • Breakfast at hotel • Visit Al Balad – UNESCO Heritage Site • Explore old & modern markets • Seafood lunch (included) • Visit Floating Mosque • Walk along Jeddah’s modern waterfront • Return to hotel & overnight stay in Jeddah

Jeddah to Dubai • Breakfast at hotel • Hotel check-out & airport transfer • Flight to Dubai (excluded) • Arrival in Dubai & hotel transfer • Check-in & free time • Overnight stay in Dubai • Meals: No meals included

Dubai Classic Tour & Desert Safari • Breakfast at hotel • Visit Bastakia Area – heritage & Emirati culture • Abra Boat ride (Water Taxi) • Explore Spice Souk & Gold Souk • Return to hotel for rest • Desert Safari (4x4) – Dune bashing, camel ride, sunset views • BBQ Dinner at desert camp (included) • Belly dance, Tanura & fire dance show • Overnight stay in Dubai

Dubai Modern Tour & Marina Dhow Cruise • Breakfast at hotel • Visit Dubai Marina, Palm Jumeirah, Ain Dubai, Atlantis the Palm • Explore Souk Madinat Jumeirah & take pictures of Burj Al Arab • Visit Burj Khalifa (124th & 125th floor, non-prime hours) • Free time at Dubai Mall • Return to hotel for rest • Evening Marina Dhow Cruise with dinner on board (included) • Overnight stay in Dubai

Full-Day Abu Dhabi Tour • Breakfast at hotel • Visit Sheikh Zayed Grand Mosque • Explore Louvre Abu Dhabi Museum • Photo stop at Emirates Palace • Drive through Al Bateen area • Visit Marina Mall (free time for shopping & lunch on your own) • Return to Dubai & overnight stay • Meals: Breakfast included
Free Day in Dubai (Optional Tours Available) • Breakfast at hotel • Enjoy a free day for shopping, relaxation, or optional excursions • Dinner at hotel (included) • Overnight stay in Dubai
Departure from Dubai • Breakfast at hotel • Hotel check-out • Transfer to Dubai International Airport • Meals: Breakfast included
